sentences.sentence: It is impossible to say at what point along the continuum a dialect becomes a separate language.
sentences.translation: 要说出同一语言的方言差异到什么程度就成为一种别的语言是不可能的。

sentences.sentence: It was difficult to understand the local dialect.
It is often appropriate to use the local dialect to communicate your message.
sentences.translation: 用方言来交流信息往往很合适。
